summary: Diff introduces a centralized Swaraj Infotech brand config and updates several UI entry points (BrandHeader, SplashScreen, Admin Login/Shell, HTML titles/icons) to reference Swaraj Infotech logos and text. However, the diff summary does not show the newly uploaded image files (1770580116347.png and 1770580116347-1.png) being added under frontend/public/assets/generated/, and it’s not possible from the provided diff summary to confirm a repo-wide removal of all remaining user-visible “Caffeine AI” references across the entire frontend.

missing_requirements.requirement: Commit the two newly uploaded logo images (1770580116347.png and 1770580116347-1.png) under frontend/public/assets/generated/ and reference them directly from the UI (not via backend).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows new references to '/assets/generated/swaraj-infotech-logo.dim_1024x1024.png' and '/assets/generated/swaraj-infotech-logo-poster.dim_1080x1920.png' in code, but there is no evidence in the diff summary that the uploaded files (1770580116347.png and 1770580116347-1.png) were actually added/committed under frontend/public/assets/generated/ (no added static asset files are shown).

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove all user-visible "Caffeine AI"/"Caffeine" branding from the entire frontend (learner app + Admin Panel).
missing_requirements.reason: Some files clearly moved to 'Swaraj Infotech', but the diff summary does not provide evidence of a repo-wide removal (e.g., edits across all screens/components where such text might appear). Without a search result or broader set of file changes, it cannot be confirmed that no remaining user-visible references exist.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced an additional brand asset path for an app icon ('playstore-app-icon.dim_512x512.png') and updated HTML favicons to use it.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to add and apply the two newly uploaded logo images (1770580116347.png and 1770580116347-1.png) and remove Caffeine AI branding. Adding/standardizing a separate app icon asset is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added new brand tagline/shortTagline strings and uses them in UI (e.g., header/splash).
hallucinated_features.reason: The request is specifically about applying the new logo everywhere and removing Caffeine AI branding; adding new tagline copy is not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed an authentication footer with support phone number and email.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the stated requirements (logo replacement + remove Caffeine AI branding). This may be benign, but it is additional functionality/content not requested.
